code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> Init
  Init --> Front: start

  state "Front Matter" as Front
  state TOC
  state Body
  state "Back Matter" as Back
  state End

  %% Events (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
  %% E_front: front signals present (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
  %% E_toc: toc signals (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
  %% E_heading: heading signals (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
  %% E_back: back signals (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
  %% E_eof: end of pages

  %% Guards
  %% G_toc_detected: we are on a TOC page or contiguous TOC continues
  %% G_anchor_match: page matches TOC anchor within ± tolerance
  %% G_after_last_chapter: expected chapters (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) reached
  %% G_sustained_back: >= 2 consecutive back-signal pages

  Front --> TOC: E_toc
  Front --> Body: E_heading || !E_toc && !E_front
  Front --> Front: E_front && !E_heading && !E_toc

  TOC --> TOC: G_toc_detected
  TOC --> Body: E_heading || !G_toc_detected

  Body --> Body: !(HealthTech_PatientRecords))
  Body --> Back: E_back && (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)

  Back --> Back: !E_eof
  Back --> End: E_eof

  Body --> End: E_eof
  TOC --> End: E_eof
  Front --> End: E_eof
  End --> [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 HealthTech_PatientRecords 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 这一块。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'HealthTech_PatientRecords 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 的逻辑。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 HealthTech_PatientRecords 和 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'HealthTech_PatientRecords 和 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
